metadata.description: Join environmentally conscious kid crusader Michael Recycle as he makes the eco-friendly leap from books to comics! Michael's green adventures are about to get a whole lot messier when he faces threats to Earth's environment from all over the globe. In the premiere issue, Michael and Solar Lola team up with Bootleg Peg to stop the polar ice caps from completely melting in "Mission Meltdown"! Can the trio save the residents of the North Pole before it's too late?
metadata.name: Michael Recycle
